# IHttpClient interface

Provides a class for sending HTTP requests and receiving HTTP responses from a resource identified by a URI.

```csharp
public interface IHttpClient : IDisposable
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [Timeout](IHttpClient/Timeout.md) { get; set; } | Gets or sets the timespan to wait before the request times out. |
| [SendAsync](IHttpClient/SendAsync.md)(…) | Send an HTTP request as an asynchronous operation. |
